bientity_condition.description: The bi-entity condition type to check for with the power holder as the actor and the entity the actor is attempting to breed as the target.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: The bi-entity condition type to check for with the power holder as the actor and the entity the actor is attempting to breed as the target.

bientity_action.description: The bi-entity action type to execute upon failing to breed an entity with the power holder as the actor and the entity the actor is attempting to breed as the target.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: The bi-entity action type to execute upon failing to breed an entity with the power holder as the actor and the entity the actor is attempting to breed as the target.

prevent_follow.description: Whether this power type prevents entities from following the power holder when a breeding item is held.
prevent_follow.markdownDescription: Whether this power type prevents entities from following the power holder when a breeding item is held.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_breeding).

Prevents the power holder from breeding `AnimalEntity`s that meet the bi-entity condition.

Type ID: `apugli:prevent_breeding`

!!! note

    Executing entity actions uses up the breeding timer of the entity, in order to modify this timer, please use the [Modify Breeding Cooldown](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_breeding) power type.
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_breeding).

Prevents the power holder from breeding `AnimalEntity`s that meet the bi-entity condition.

Type ID: `apugli:prevent_breeding`

!!! note

    Executing entity actions uses up the breeding timer of the entity, in order to modify this timer, please use the [Modify Breeding Cooldown](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_breeding) power type.
